sorular.soru: Which vehicle has the highest energy consumption?

feedback.metin: A passenger car with a bicycle carrier has more air resistance and has higher energy consumption than a passenger car without a bicycle carrier. However, a passenger car with a trailer consumes even more energy because of the air resistance and the extra weight of the trailer.

sorular.soru: Which sign warns of the danger of slipping?

feedback.metin: Sign J-20 warns of the danger of slipping. Sign J-25 warns of loose chippings and sign J-34 warns of an accident further on. The latter is usually indicated on an electronic matrix sign.

sorular.soru: In which situation should you let the other road user go first?

feedback.metin: In the upper two situations, you do not have to give way to the car from the left and the pedestrian from the right. You only have to give way to drivers from the right. So not to drivers from the left or pedestrians from the right. You have to give way to all other traffic when entering an exit construction. So in the bottom left situation you have to give way to the pedestrian. In the bottom right situation you are dealing with an emergency vehicle with flashing lights and siren. You must always give way to emergency vehicles. So the correct answer is the bottom two situations.
